mapper.select: SELECT tsr.* FROM t_sys_resource tsr LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource tsrr ON tsr.id = tsrr.resource_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_role tsur ON tsur.role_id = tsrr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user tsu ON tsu.id = tsur.user_id WHERE tsu.username = #{username} AND tsr.type = #{type} ORDER BY tsr.sort_number

SELECT tsr.id, tsr.parent_id, tsr.name, IF(tsrr.id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS hasPermission FROM t_sys_resource tsr LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource tsrr ON tsr.id = tsrr.resource_id AND tsrr.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY tsr.sort_number
